channel.title: Photoshop User Survey
channel.description:
I'm just creating a quick survey before I do anything with Spiced-FX.
Question 1. Would you use a big graphics resource site? Brushes, Renders, C4Ds, Stocks ect. 1,000+
Question 2. If 'Yes' to above, what would you like to see on this site?
Question 3. Would you prefer to have a forum, or not to have a forum?
Question 4. Do you have any other suggestions?

item.title: Photoshop User Survey

item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I shall support you with some member getting.

Read full topic

item.title: Photoshop User Survey
item.dc:creator: @fezz fezz
item.description:
@fezz wrote:

Question 1. Would you use a big graphics resource site? Brushes, Renders, C4Ds, Stocks ect. 1,000+

yes.

Question 2. If ‘Yes’ to above, what would you like to see on this site? good renders c4ds etc.
i prefer quality over quantity

Question 3. Would you prefer to have a forum, or not to have a forum?
yes, a forum would be nice so that you can hang out with the community

Question 4. Do you have any other suggestions?
none.

Read full topic

item.title: Photoshop User Survey
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

I’m just creating a quick survey before I do anything with Spiced-FX.

Question 1. Would you use a big graphics resource site? Brushes, Renders, C4Ds, Stocks ect. 1,000+
I usually use google to find the exact thing I want, but if there was that many there, I would probably be more than likesly to find something I want >_<

Question 2. If ‘Yes’ to above, what would you like to see on this site?
FONTS! Nobody has fonts >_<

Question 3. Would you prefer to have a forum, or not to have a forum?
Forums are good for getting feedback. I <3 Feedback. I’d prefer a forum (:

Question 4. Do you have any other suggestions?
Use a blue and white and silver colour scheme. They’re (H)

Read full topic

item.title: Photoshop User Survey
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

I would want recources, but not loads of crap ones mixed with good ones, maybe like on gamerenders…If there is somone new to rendering and has started making packs his/her packs would go into the - Normal Render Packs - And if an Awsome renderer was making packs, and it was good, it would go into the - Good render Packs -.

I would want a forum, so if you had recources you could comment on them and maybe post sigs that they had made with them, and maybe give pointers on how to render better, add effets at the end and so on.

If it was graphics based i wouldn’t have the Programing section, i’d want it all graphics, and be trying to get different people into GFX, different sections for different people, like, Spiced-Fx Starter at the beggining, and when your improving, and have got got better they would go to the next section, Regular at the Joint…And in the end they would become Spiced-Fx Legend and that would take so many improvments until there so ownage…And maybe a test of every section, or a vote, to see who would go up. Say if it was Kaza vs Mr.chris to go up, we would both make a gallery of our 5 best sigs from that section and see who deserves to up, and other people could vote.

Well, that’s just some idea’s ;).

Read full topic

item.title: Photoshop User Survey
item.dc:creator: @Greek_Line Greek Line
item.description:
@Greek_Line wrote:

Question 1. Would you use a big graphics resource site? Brushes, Renders, C4Ds, Stocks ect. 1,000+
Yeh…I make atleast 1 sig(or more) or w/e a day.

Question 2. If ‘Yes’ to above, what would you like to see on this site?
Girls…Lol Jking (you can do though :P)…More forum graphics to make it bling better.

Question 3. Would you prefer to have a forum, or not to have a forum?
Get a forum, and also add an shout box to it as well.

Question 4. Do you have any other suggestions?
In graphics make a vid TuT for people. That way the beginners can understand better.

Your Sincerely
Greek Line

PS: Thank you for tips by the way.

Read full topic
